title: "Healthcare AI funding plummets by 32% in Q1 of '22"
excerpt: "Healthcare funding for artificial intelligence declined from $3.7 billion in the fourth quarter of 2021 to $2.5 billion in the first quarter of 2022, according to a May 12 report by tech market analytics firm CB Insights."
